entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
